install_toolchain: Installing rust minimal toolchain and extra components...
installing_toolchain_info: info: installing rustup and rust toolchain
install_finish_info: info: Rust is installed, this setup will soon create an example project at current directory for you to try Rust!
unix_remove_env_fail_warn:
warn: unable to remove the desired content from file: '%{path}'. This could mean it was already removed, please try manually removing the following content from that file if there's any: 

%{val}
unix_add_path_fail_warn: warn: unable to add path '%{val}' to rc file '%{rc_path}' as it might already exists.
windows_not_modify_path_warn: warn: the registry key HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Environment\PATH is not a string, skip modifying the PATH variable.
remove_vscode_shortcut_warn: warn: unable to remove shortcut file '%{path}'
remove_path_fail_warn: warn: unable to remove '%{path}', please try manually removing it.
open_example_project_warn: warn: unable to open example directory with `VSCode` or `file explorer`, try open it manually: %{dir}
skip_extension_uninstall_warn: warn: extension '%{ext}' for '%{program}' is not installed, skipping...
channel_communicate_err: error: unable to send tx details: %{sum}
welcome:
Thanks for using %{vendor} Rust installer.

This program will guide you through installing the Rust programming language, with additional third party tools of your choice.
custom_install_help: Enter the value of each installation options, or just press 'Enter' key to use the default value.
question_component_choice: Choose any tools you want to install, separated by spaces (required tools are seleted no matter the input):
